data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos at Nissan Stadium.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos close to the penalty box.
Ball safe as Nagoya is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Yokohama.
In the minute 6, Minoru Tojo awards Nagoya a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Nagoya awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 9, Yokohama Marinos drives forward and Kota Watanabe gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Nagoya in their own half.
Throw-in for Nagoya in their own half.
In the minute 11, Nagoya are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Jun Amano gets his shot on target but fails to score for Yokohama Marinos.
Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Minoru Tojo.
In the minute 13, Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
Throw-in Yokohama Marinos.
Free kick Nagoya.
In the minute 17, Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Nagoya.
In the minute 20, Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Minoru Tojo.
Minoru Tojo awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Yokohama Marinos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nagoya's half?
In the minute 21, Jun Amano for Yokohama Marinos gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Nagoya goal kick.
Throw-in for Nagoya in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 22, Nagoya drive into the zone and Mateus is presented with a brilliant opportunity. But his strike hits the upright!
Minoru Tojo signals a Nagoya throw-in in Yokohama Marinos's half.
Nagoya awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 24, Mu Kanazaki of Nagoya is pulled up for offside.
Nagoya awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Nagoya at Nissan Stadium.
In the minute 28, Throw-in Yokohama Marinos.
Nagoya to take a throw-in in Yokohama Marinos territory.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Nagoya.
In the minute 30, Can Nagoya get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Yokohama Marinos's half?
Mu Kanazaki's header is off-target for Nagoya.
Yokohama Marinos have a goal kick.
In the minute 32, Goal kick for Nagoya at Nissan Stadium.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Yokohama Marinos's Jun Amano misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 33, Ball goes out of play for a Nagoya goal kick.
Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 36, Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Minoru Tojo.
Nagoya to take a throw-in in Yokohama Marinos territory.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
In the minute 38, Eitaro Matsuda (Yokohama Marinos) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
Yokohama Marinos's Ryuta Koike gets in a shot on goal at Nissan Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 39, Throw-in high up the field for Nagoya in Yokohama.
Yokohama Marinos needs to be cautious. Nagoya have an attacking throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Yokohama.
In the minute 41, Goal kick for Yokohama Marinos at Nissan Stadium.
Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Edigar Junio scores to make it 1-0 at Nissan Stadium.
In the minute 41, Great play from Eitaro Matsuda to set up the goal.
At Nissan Stadium, Nagoya are penalized for being offside.
Minoru Tojo signals a Yokohama Marinos throw-in in Nagoya's half.
In the minute 45, At Nissan Stadium the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Yokohama Marinos are pushing forward but Kota Mizunuma's finish is wide of the goal.
Minoru Tojo awards Nagoya a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
Yokohama Marinos awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Nagoya advance rapidly upfield but Minoru Tojo blows for offside.
In the minute 45, Minoru Tojo blows to end the first-half.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Can Yokohama Marinos capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Nagoya's half?
In the minute 46, Nagoya have a goal kick.
Yokohama Marinos's Edigar Junio is on target but unsuccessful.
Nagoya awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nagoya to take a throw-in in Yokohama Marinos territory.
In the minute 49, The match at Nissan Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Shinnosuke Nakatani, who is down injured.
Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Minoru Tojo awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 51, Ball safe as Nagoya is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 51, The away team have replaced Hiroyuki Abe with Ryogo Yamasaki. This is the first substitution made today by Massimo Ficcadenti.
Massimo Ficcadenti (Nagoya) is making a second substitution, with Ryotaro Ishida replacing Naoki Maeda.
Nagoya's Shinnosuke Nakatani looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 53, Ado Onaiwu is on a sub for Edigar Junio for Yokohama Marinos.
Jun Amano of Yokohama Marinos smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Minoru Tojo signals a throw-in for Yokohama Marinos, close to Nagoya's area.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Nagoya.
In Yokohama a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in Nagoya.
In the minute 57, Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Yokohama Marinos have a dangerous throw-in.
Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Nagoya in their own half.
In the minute 59, Free kick for Nagoya in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
Shumpei Naruse is replacing Kazuya Miyahara for Nagoya at Nissan Stadium.
Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Nagoya.
In the minute 61, Ryogo Yamasaki (Nagoya) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Goal kick for Yokohama Marinos at Nissan Stadium.
Minoru Tojo awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 61, Yokohama Marinos drive upfield and Jun Amano gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Nagoya defender.
Minoru Tojo signals a Yokohama Marinos throw-in in Nagoya's half.
Free kick Nagoya.
In the minute 63, Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos at Nissan Stadium.
Yokohama Marinos are whistled for offside.
Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
In the minute 65, Mateus for Nagoya drives towards goal at Nissan Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Nagoya awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Nagoya in Yokohama.
In the minute 67, Yokohama Marinos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Yokohama Marinos's Ken Matsubara gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Minoru Tojo awards Nagoya a goal kick.
In the minute 69, Can Nagoya get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Yokohama Marinos's half?
Goal! Mateus equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
That's a fine assist from Ryogo Yamasaki.
In the minute 71, Ange Postecoglou is making the team's second substitution at Nissan Stadium with Daizen Maeda replacing Eitaro Matsuda.
Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
Ange Postecoglou (Yokohama Marinos) is making a third substitution, with Erik replacing Kota Mizunuma.
In the minute 73, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Nagoya.
Yokohama Marinos to take a throw-in in Nagoya territory.
In the minute 76, Can Nagoya get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Yokohama Marinos's half?
Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Minoru Tojo.
Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
In the minute 79, Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Nagoya in their own half.
Ball safe as Nagoya is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kota Watanabe is on target to give Yokohama Marinos a 2-1 advantage.
In the minute 80, Ryuta Koike with an assist there.
Minoru Tojo signals a Nagoya throw-in in Yokohama Marinos's half.
Nagoya's Sho Inagaki breaks free at Nissan Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 83, Yokohama Marinos have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
Ken Matsubara gets his shot on target but fails to score for Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 86, Nagoya's Mateus has run offside.
In the minute 87, Nagoya are in shooting range from this free kick.
Oh Jae-suk is replacing Kosuke Ota for the away team.
The away team have replaced Takuji Yonemoto with Joao Schmidt. This is the fifth substitution made today by Massimo Ficcadenti.
In Yokohama Yokohama Marinos attack through Jun Amano. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Nagoya goal kick.
Jun Amano (Yokohama Marinos) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Minoru Tojo will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Can Yokohama Marinos capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Nagoya's half?
In Yokohama a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Mu Kanazaki for the away team is judged to be offside.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Nagoya awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Nagoya in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
Nagoya pushes forward through Ryotaro Ishida, whose finish on goal is saved.
Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
The match is over. Final score 2-1.
Yokohama Marinos make their fourth substitution with Takuya Kida replacing Jun Amano.
Yuki Otsu is replacing Kota Watanabe for Yokohama Marinos at Nissan Stadium.
Joao Schmidt (Nagoya) has received a yellow card from Minoru Tojo.
Ryuta Koike is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
